$comment: Schema for classes. The definitions are arranged in alphabetical order.

parameters.description: Parameters of this item. Each entry has the same keys. Table list. Automated.

name.description: Name of the parameter. String. Automated.

type.description: The datatype of the parameter. String. Automated.

default.description: The default value of the parameter. Any. Automated.

summary.description: A single sentence definition of the parameter. String.

returns.description: Returns of this item. Each entry has the same keys. Table list. Automated.

type.description: The datatype of the return. String. Automated.

summary.description: A single sentence definition of the return. String.

security_tags.description: Security tag for this item. Enum. Automated.

tags.description: Tags for this item, such as Deprecated. String list. Automated.

thread_safety.description: Thread safety of this item. Enum. Automated.

name.description: The name of the class. Determines the name of the page. Used for automatic cross-linking. String. Automated.

type.description: the type of the API (class, datatype, enum, global, library). Automated.

memory_category.description: Defines where the class appears in the Memory tab of the Developer Console. Automated.

summary.$comment: Summary of the class to appear in Script Editor Autocomplete.
summary.description: A single sentence overview of this class. Used in hover menus and suggestions. String.

description.$comment: Full description of the class to appear on the website.
description.description: A long description of how the class operates. Markdown.

code_samples.description: A list of code samples for the class. String list.

inherits.description: Defines which classes this class inherits from. String list.

deprecation_message.description: Description of why the class is deprecated and what to use instead.

properties.description: A list of properties. Each entry has the same keys. Table list. Automated.

name.description: The name of the property. String. Automated.

summary.description: A single sentence overview of the property. String.

description.description: A long description of the property. String.

code_samples.description: A list of code samples for the property. String list.

type.description: The data type of the property. string. Automated.

deprecation_message.description: Description of why the property is deprecated and what to use instead. String.

security.description: Security tags for this property. Automated.

read.description: The read security tag for this property. String. Automated.

write.description: The write security tag for this property. String. Automated.

category.description: The name of the category that this property appears under in the Properties window in Studio. Automated.

serialization.description: Serialization for this property. Object. Automated.

can_load.description: The read security tag for this property. String. Automated.

can_save.description: The write security tag for this property. String. Automated.

methods.description: A list of methods. Each entry has the same keys. Table list. Automated.

name.description: The name of the method. String. Automated.

summary.description: A single sentence overview of the method. String.

description.description: A long description of the method. String.

code_samples.description: A list of code samples for the method. String list.

deprecation_message.description: Description of why the method is deprecated and what to use instead. String.

security.description: Security tag for this method. String. Automated.

events.description: A list of events. Each entry has the same keys. Table list. Automated.

name.description: The name of the event. String. Automated.

summary.description: A single sentence overview of the event. String.

description.description: A long description of the event. String.

code_samples.description: A list of code samples for the event. String list.

deprecation_message.description: Description of why the event is deprecated and what to use instead. String.

security.description: Security tag for this event. String. Automated.

callbacks.description: A list of callbacks. Each entry has the same keys. Table list. Automated.

name.description: The name of the callback. String. Automated.

summary.description: A single sentence overview of the callback. String.

description.description: A long description of the callback. String.

code_samples.description: A list of code samples for the callback. String list.

deprecation_message.description: Description of why the callback is deprecated and what to use instead. String.

security.description: Security tag for this callback. String. Automated.
